name: Last Light (itch) (Wayfarer of Time)
description:
The world is gripped by darkness. However, there is still light. The last light. "And the last hope" - someone who believes in fairy tales would say. But you realize: its extinction is inevitable...

All you have left is despair. And the desire to kill those who caused it.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys - movement
Left mouse button (hold) - attack
